channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Trading Up With Mandy
channel.desc: Trading Up with Mandy Rennehan follows Blue Collar CEO and multimillion-dollar designer and construction mogul, Mandy Rennehan as she overhauls three unique properties in her beloved hometown of Yarmouth, Nova Scotia.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener
channel.desc: We look at must have plants that you are sure to find at your local nursery. Tanya shares a hanging basket DIY using airplants and we visit a garden with an inspiring entertainment area.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Nadiya Bakes
channel.desc: Nadiya shares four recipes of pure, chocolatey bliss. First a brownie, next, the fruit cobble, then treacle and star anise madeleines, and finally a chocolate and caramel flan.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We delve deeper into what needs to be done to manage and overcome obesity, we explore ins and outs of Pilates, and we take a closer look at some of the challenges surrounding dietary collagen sources.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Flat Out Fabulous
channel.desc: Whinnie and Tyler are in sunny Salford meeting 7 students that are desperate to give their digs a new lease of life.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
channel.desc: House hunters are taken to see properties for sale in a foreign country that they want to move to or frequently holiday in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Art Of Architecture
channel.desc: South African architect, Sumayya Vally has been invited to design and build the Serpentine Pavilion, in London's Kensington Gardens.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs UK
channel.desc: Grand Designs UK, hosted by designer and writer Kevin McCloud, follows intrepid homebuilders as they pursue their architectural dreams.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We delve deeper into what needs to be done to manage and overcome obesity, we explore ins and outs of Pilates, and we take a closer look at some of the challenges surrounding dietary collagen sources.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Florence and Humberto have loved living in their LA bungalow for over 20 years. The couple needs help deciding how to make their housework for their evolving needs.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Trading Up With Mandy
channel.desc: Trading Up with Mandy Rennehan follows Blue Collar CEO and multimillion-dollar designer and construction mogul, Mandy Rennehan as she overhauls three unique properties in her beloved hometown of Yarmouth, Nova Scotia.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook
channel.desc: Donal shares recipes to suit every kind of busy household, with new, easy-to-follow recipes, time-saving hacks and practical cooking tips, including the kitchen gadgets that Donal relies on at home.

channel.title: Cheap Irish Homes
